hero.title: Press Kit
hero.subtitle: Media Resources & Company Information
hero.description: Download our brand assets, company information, and media resources for editorial use.

companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.description: Coreway Solution is a leading software development and technology consulting company specializing in AI-powered solutions, custom software development, and digital transformation.
companyOverview.boilerplate: Coreway Solution is a technology company that helps businesses build innovative software solutions and accelerate their digital transformation. With expertise in AI/ML, cloud infrastructure, IoT, and custom software development, we partner with clients across industries to deliver scalable, secure, and user-centric solutions. Our team of experienced engineers, designers, and strategists work collaboratively to turn complex challenges into elegant solutions.

brandAssets.title: Brand Assets
brandAssets.description: Download our logos, color palettes, and brand guidelines for use in publications and media.

logos.name: Primary Logo
logos.description: Full color logo for light backgrounds

members.name: John Anderson
members.title: Chief Executive Officer
members.bio: John has over 15 years of experience in technology leadership, having previously led engineering teams at Fortune 500 companies. He founded Coreway with a vision to make cutting-edge technology accessible to businesses of all sizes.

members.name: Sarah Chen
members.title: Chief Technology Officer
members.bio: Sarah is a technology innovator with expertise in AI/ML and cloud architecture. She holds a PhD in Computer Science and has published numerous papers on machine learning applications.

members.name: Michael Rodriguez
members.title: Chief Operating Officer
members.bio: Michael brings extensive experience in scaling technology companies and operational excellence. He has successfully led multiple organizations through rapid growth phases.

mediaContact.title: Media Inquiries
mediaContact.description: For press inquiries, interview requests, or additional information, please contact our media relations team.
mediaContact.responseTime: We typically respond to media inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

guidelines.title: Usage Guidelines
rules: Always use official logos and brand assets provided in this press kit
Do not alter, distort, or modify our logos in any way
Maintain proper spacing and clear space around logos
Do not use outdated logos or create your own versions
Refer to our brand guidelines document for detailed usage rules
Contact our media team if you have questions about asset usage
